format: A data frame containing 65 observations on 6 variables.

parameters.rgdp60: value of GDP per capita in 1960, converted to 1960 US dollars.
parameters.revolutions:
average annual number of revolutions, 
insurrections (successful or not) and coup d'etats in that country from 1960 to 1995.
parameters.growth: average annual percentage growth of real GDP from 1960 to 1995.
parameters.education: average number of years of schooling of adult residents in that country in 1960.
parameters.assassinations:
average annual number of political assassinations 
in that country from 1960 to 1995 (in per million population).

title: Determinants of Economic Growth
description:
Description
Data on average growth rates over 1960–1995 for 65 countries, along with
variables that are potentially related to growth.
reference: Online complements to Stock and Watson (2007).
